Service Details: - Offers hearing services that include assessments and hearing aid evaluations, selection, dispensing, fitting, maintenance, cleaning, check-ups and repairs, Tinnitus evaluation and treatment, ear impressions when necessary, comprehensive follow-up care, musician ear plugs and in-ear monitors, custom hearing protection- Offers various batteries for sale, counselling on hearing aid use, assistive devices for TV, telephone, etc., and sound alert devices
